author: Ethan Duffy
comment: Would be nice if the default screen on opening could be set. Otherwise, wonderful!
title: A bargain at the price of free

author: Mark Gillespie
comment: Uses the old pre-GPS Androidwear SDK.   Latest 5 supports native GPS, and means watches that have built in GPS (like the Sony smartwatch) will use this when there is no host mobile connected.  Please consider updating to latest SDK and using LocationManager API.
title: Nice, but sorely needs an update.

author: Robert Collier
comment: Could still be improved by the option to also show the time on the speedo screen.
title: Excellent little app.

author: aikhong seah
comment: The speed has a error of minus 8km/hr
title: Good

author: Tomi
comment: Simple,looks good,can be easily read under direct sunlight. However the speed measurements are a bit off when the speed is low but only in certain occasions. It is quite accurate in my experience ,unless I'm mistaking. Would be nice if it also had some kind of rudimentary compass ,perhaps ?

reply.author: Reductio Ad Absurdum
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. I added compass functionality in the new version.

title: Nice UI
